title: Achieving stable lithium metal anodes via the synergy of electrostatic shielding and the high Li+ flux inorganic interphase
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4519-4530
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00399C, Paper
Jiangtao Yu, Xinyu Ma, Xiuyang Zou, Yin Hu, Mingchen Yang, Jinhua Yang, Shipeng Sun, Feng Yan
A cationic polymer was developed as protective layer for Li anodes. The multiple cationic sites in molecule provided enhanced electrostatic shielding, whereas NO3âˆ’ anions generated robust and high Li+ flux inorganic SEI.
